Keywords: Amazon , Batman Family , Deity , Future , Green Lantern Corps , Justice League , Soldier , Warrior
Real Name: Diana Prince
Special Powers
FOR OUR PAST...: Wonder Woman may have both BTU #s001 Utility Belt and BTU #s002 Green Lantern Ring assigned and equipped at the same time.
FOR THE FALLEN...: When a friendly standard character would be KO'd by an opposing effect, after resolutions turn Wonder Woman to click #1. // Wonder Woman can use the printed team abilities from friendly characters in your KO area.
FOR THE FUTURE!: Defend, Invincible, Super Senses.
